entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
